amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the DOJ's Regional Information Sharing System (RISS) by $18 million and reduces funds for NOAA climate research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for Office of Justice Programs Research, Evaluation, and Statistics by $18 million and reduce funds for National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration by $18 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grimm amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 209 - 199 (Roll no. 210).
